test-1.descriptions: When inheritplotbordercolorfromplot=1 is given from chart level then all four border colour should take the plot color for all series

test-2.descriptions: when inheritplotbordercolorfromplot=1 and drawfullareaborder=0 is given from chart level then only upper border should take the colour of the area

test-3.descriptions: when inheritplotbordercolorfromplot=1  is given from chart level then alpha/opacity of the border should be 100% when plotborderalpha is not specified.

test-5.descriptions: when inheritplotbordercolorfromplot=1 and plotbordercolor is specified in chart level then specified plot border colour should applied rather than plot fill colour

test-8.descriptions: When inheritplotbordercolorfromplot=0 is given from chart level then all four border colour should take the default border colour(black) for all series

test-12.descriptions: When inheritplotbordercolorfromplot=1 and plotborderalpha=20 is given from chart level then plotbordercolor will take the colour from plot but alpha of the border should be 20%

test-13.descriptions: When inheritplotbordercolorfromplot=1 is given from dataset level then all four border colour should take the plot fill color for all series

test-14.descriptions: when inheritplotbordercolorfromplot=1 and drawfullareaborder=0 is given from dataset level then only upper border should take the colour of the area

test-15.descriptions: when inheritplotbordercolorfromplot=1 and plotbordercolor is specified in dataset level then specified plot border colour should applied rather than plot fill colour

test-18.descriptions: When inheritplotbordercolorfromplot=1 and plotborderalpha=20 is given from dataset level then all four border colour should take the plot fill color for all series with opacity/alpha of the border will be 20%

test-19.descriptions: when inheritplotbordercolor=0 ,color of plot should not applied in border

test-22.descriptions: When inheritplotbordercolorfromplot is set from chart level =0 and dataset level=1 then only that particluar dataset  plotbordercolor will take the colour of plot

test-23.descriptions: When inheritplotbordercolorfromplot is set from chart level =1 and dataset level=0 then only that particluar dataset will not taking plotbordercolor from plotfillcolor(mean black) and other datasets will taking the colour of the border from the plot fill colour

test-24.descriptions: When inheritplotbordercolorfromplot is set from chart level =1 and dataset level=0 then only that particluar dataset will not taking plotbordercolor from plotfillcolor(mean black) and other datasets will taking the colour of the border from the plot fill colour

test-25.descriptions: When inheritplotbordercolorfromplot is set from chart level =1and dataset level=1 then all dataset  plotbordercolor will take the colour of plot

test-28.descriptions: when inheritplotbordercolorfromplot=1 and drawfullareaborder=0, plotfillalpha=10 is given from chart level then only upper border should take the colour and alpha of the area

test-29.descriptions: when inheritplotbordercolorfromplot=1 and drawfullareaborder=0, plotfillalpha=10 is given from chart level and also from dataset level then only upper border should take the colour and alpha of the area
